value.string: To validate the mandatory nodes are present in the given XML
1. If the node is not present or If the node value is empty, then 'Mandatory Fields Missing' error will be thrown
2. Each of the missing mandatory fields will be available in a variable
-------- At start, there are no Missing Mandatory Fields
--------  Loop through each configuration file in the configuration folder
-------- If the file is not XLs file, skip the file from processing
-------- Sheet1 will be the default sheet of every XLS --------
-------- Hence starting the check from that sheet always
-------- As the verification is over, removing the sheet from Bag
-------- For each sheet in the TBDSheetsList is ended!
-------- For each sheet in the varBag is ended!
-------- At end, printing the missing mandatory fields
-------- For each file in the Config folder is ended!
-------- At end, printing the missing mandatory fields
-------- If there are missing mandatory fields, then raise error flag with error remarks="Mandatory fields verification failed"

value.expression: $Error-Description$ Exception occurred at line number $Error-LineNumber.Number:toString$. You chose to mark the bot as 'Failed' in case of any encountered errors.
